instructions.1: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Grease a baking dish.
instructions.2: Spread about 2 tablespoons of pesto per chicken breast over the top of each breast, and wrap each breast in prosciutto slices to cover the entire breast. Place the wrapped chicken breasts into the prepared baking dish.
instructions.3: Bake in the preheated oven until the chicken is no longer pink, the juices run clear, and the prosciutto is lightly crisped, about 25 minutes.

questions.question: In Step 3, is the oven from Step 1 being used?
Is oven from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is oven from Step 1 still available in Step 3?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 3?
If we skip Step 1, is it still valid to use the oven in Step 3?
Can we preheat (Step 1) and bake (Step 3) at the same time?
